fields.Name: Bulbasaur
fields.Pokedex: Bulbasaur can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun's rays, the seed grows progressively larger.

fields.Name: Ivysaur
fields.Pokedex: To support its bulb, Ivysaur's legs grow sturdy. If it spends more time lying in the sunlight, the bud will soon bloom into a large flower.

fields.Name: Venusaur
fields.Pokedex: Venusaur's flower is said to take on vivid colors if it gets plenty of nutrition and sunlight. The flower's aroma soothes the emotions of people.

fields.Name: Charmander
fields.Pokedex: The flame that burns at the tip of its tail is an indication of its emotions. The flame wavers when Charmander is happy, and blazes when it is enraged.

fields.Name: Charmeleon
fields.Pokedex: Without pity, its sharp claws destroy foes. If it encounters a strong enemy, it becomes agitated, and the flame on its tail flares with a bluish white color.

fields.Name: Charizard
fields.Pokedex: A Charizard flies about in search of strong opponents. It breathes intense flames that can melt any material. However, it will never torch a weaker foe.

fields.Name: Squirtle
fields.Pokedex: Its shell is not just for protection. Its rounded shape and the grooves on its surface minimize resistance in water, enabling Squirtle to swim at high speeds.

fields.Name: Wartortle
fields.Pokedex: Its large tail is covered with rich, thick fur that deepens in color with age. The scratches on its shell are evidence of this Pokémon's toughness in battle.

fields.Name: Blastoise
fields.Pokedex: The waterspouts that protrude from its shell are highly accurate. Their bullets of water can precisely nail tin cans from a distance of over 160 feet.

fields.Name: Caterpie
fields.Pokedex: Tiene una cabeza y ojos muy grandes y unas antenas rojas llamativas, todo para asemejarse a un Ekans e intimidar a sus muchos depredadores.

fields.Name: Metapod
fields.Pokedex: Utiliza una seda especial que se endurece al contacto con el aire para crear una coraza resistente mientras espera para evolucionar de nuevo.

fields.Name: Butterfree
fields.Pokedex: Tiene un gran apetito y puede alejarse hasta 10km para buscar miel y almacenarla en su nido. Poliniza a muchos Pokémon planta.

fields.Name: Weedle
fields.Pokedex: Los aguijones de su cabeza y cola liberan veneno al mínimo roce y pueden producir desde sensación de picor o quemazón hasta nauseas.

fields.Name: Kakuna
fields.Pokedex: Viven en colmenas donde los Weedle se ayudan a hacerse las pupas o corazas y los Beedrill protegen al resto hasta que evolucionan.

fields.Name: Beedrill
fields.Pokedex: En cada colmena hay una Beedrill reina que es la que pone huevos y el resto la defiende. El más fuerte además la fecunda cuando es necesario.

fields.Name: Pidgey
fields.Pokedex: It has an extremely sharp sense of direction. It can unerringly return home to its nest, however far it may be removed from its familiar surroundings.

fields.Name: Pidgeotto
fields.Pokedex: This Pokémon flies around, patrolling its large territory. If its living space is violated, it shows no mercy in thoroughly punishing the foe with its sharp claws.

fields.Name: Pidgeot
fields.Pokedex: This Pokémon has gorgeous, glossy feathers. Many trainers are so captivated by the beautiful feathers on its head that they choose Pidgeot as their Pokémon.

fields.Name: Rattata
fields.Pokedex: A Rattata is cautious in the extreme. Even while it is asleep, it constantly moves its ears and listens for danger. It will make its nest anywhere.

fields.Name: Raticate
fields.Pokedex: A Raticate's sturdy fangs grow steadily. To keep them ground down, it gnaws on rocks and logs. It may even chew on the walls of houses.

fields.Name: Spearow
fields.Pokedex: Its loud cry can be heard over half a mile away. If its high, keening cry is heard echoing all around, it is a sign that they are warning each other of danger.

fields.Name: Fearow
fields.Pokedex: Its long neck and elongated beak are ideal for catching prey in soil or water. It deftly moves this extended and skinny beak to pluck prey.

fields.Name: Ekans
fields.Pokedex: An Ekans curls itself up in a spiral while it rests. This position allows it to quickly respond to an enemy from any direction with a threat from its upraised head.

fields.Name: Arbok
fields.Pokedex: This Pokémon has a terrifically strong constricting power. It can even flatten steel oil drums. Once it wraps its body around its foe, escaping is impossible.

fields.Name: Pikachu
fields.Pokedex: It stores electricity in the electric sacs on its cheeks. When it releases pent-up energy in a burst, the electric power is equal to a lightning bolt.

fields.Name: Raichu
fields.Pokedex: If it stores too much electricity, its behavior turns aggressive. To avoid this, it occasionally discharges excess energy and calms itself down.

fields.Name: Sandshrew
fields.Pokedex: When it curls up in a ball, it can make any attack bounce off harmlessly. Its hide has turned tough and solid as a result of living in the desert.

fields.Name: Sandslash
fields.Pokedex: It curls up in a ball to protect itself from enemy attacks. It also curls up to prevent heatstroke during the daytime when temperatures rise sharply.

fields.Name: Nidoran
fields.Pokedex: Its highly toxic barbs are thought to have developed as protection for this small-bodied Pokémon. When enraged, it releases a horrible toxin from its horn.

fields.Name: Nidorina
fields.Pokedex: When it is with its friends or family, its barbs are tucked away to prevent injury. It appears to become nervous if separated from the others.

fields.Name: Nidoqueen
fields.Pokedex: It is adept at sending foes flying with harsh tackles using its tough, scaly body. This Pokémon is at its strongest when it is defending its young.

fields.Name: Nidoran
fields.Pokedex: The male Nidoran has developed muscles that freely move its ears in any direction. Even the slightest sound does not escape this Pokémon's notice.

fields.Name: Nidorino
fields.Pokedex: Its horn is harder than a diamond. If it senses a hostile presence, all the barbs on its back bristle up at once, and it challenges the foe with all its might.

fields.Name: Nidoking
fields.Pokedex: A Nidoking's thick tail packs enormously destructive power capable of toppling a metal transmission tower. Once it goes on a rampage, there is no stopping it.

fields.Name: Clefairy
fields.Pokedex: On every night of a full moon, they come out to play. When dawn arrives, the tired Clefairy go to sleep nestled up against each other in deep and quiet mountains.

fields.Name: Clefable
fields.Pokedex: A Clefable uses its wings to skip lightly as if it were flying. Its bouncy step lets it even walk on water. On quiet, moonlit nights, it strolls on lakes.

fields.Name: Vulpix
fields.Pokedex: It can freely control fire, making fiery orbs fly like will-o'-the-wisps. Just before evolution, its six tails grow hot as if on fire.

fields.Name: Ninetales
fields.Pokedex: It has long been said that each of the nine tails embody an enchanted power. A long-lived Ninetales will have fur that shines like gold.

fields.Name: Jigglypuff
fields.Pokedex: Puede inflarse de aire hasta volúmenes increíbles para poder flotar o cantar durante un largo tiempo sin necesidad de coger aire.

fields.Name: Wigglytuff
fields.Pokedex: Controla muy bien su capacidad para inflarse e intimidar así a sus enemigos y propinarles golpes más dolorosos al tener un tamaño mayor.

fields.Name: Zubat
fields.Pokedex: While living in pitch-black caverns, their eyes gradually grew shut and deprived them of vision. They use ultrasonic waves to detect obstacles.

fields.Name: Golbat
fields.Pokedex: Its fangs easily puncture even thick animal hide. It loves to feast on the blood of people and Pokémon. It flits about in darkness and strikes from behind.

fields.Name: Oddish
fields.Pokedex: This Pokémon grows by absorbing moonlight. During the daytime, it buries itself in the ground, leaving only its leaves exposed to avoid detection by its enemies.

fields.Name: Gloom
fields.Pokedex: A horribly noxious honey drools from its mouth. One whiff of the honey can result in memory loss. Some fans are said to enjoy this overwhelming stink, however.

fields.Name: Vileplume
fields.Pokedex: In seasons when it produces more pollen, the air around a Vileplume turns yellow with the powder as it walks. The pollen is highly toxic and causes paralysis.

fields.Name: Paras
fields.Pokedex: A Paras has parasitic tochukaso mushrooms growing on its back. They grow by drawing nutrients from the host. They are valued as a medicine for long life.

fields.Name: Parasect
fields.Pokedex: Parasect are known to infest the roots of large trees en masse and drain nutrients. When an infested tree dies, they move onto another tree all at once.

fields.Name: Venonat
fields.Pokedex: Its coat of thin, stiff hair that covers its entire body is said to have evolved for protection. Its large eyes never fail to spot even miniscule prey.

fields.Name: Venomoth
fields.Pokedex: Venomoth are nocturnal--they only are active at night. Their favorite prey are insects that gather around streetlights, attracted by the light in the darkness.

fields.Name: Diglett
fields.Pokedex: Diglett are raised in most farms. The reason is simple--wherever they burrow, the soil is left perfectly tilled for growing delicious crops.

fields.Name: Dugtrio
fields.Pokedex: Because the triplets originally split from one body, they think exactly alike. They work cooperatively to burrow endlessly through the ground.

fields.Name: Meowth
fields.Pokedex: Meowth withdraw their sharp claws into their paws to silently sneak about. For some reason, this Pokémon loves shiny coins that glitter with light.

fields.Name: Persian
fields.Pokedex: A Persian's six bold whiskers sense air movements to determine what is in its vicinity. It becomes docile if grabbed by the whiskers.

fields.Name: Psyduck
fields.Pokedex: When its headache intensifies, it starts using strange powers. However, it has no recollection of its powers, so it always looks befuddled and bewildered.

fields.Name: Golduck
fields.Pokedex: A Golduck is an adept swimmer. It sometimes joins competitive swimmers in training. It uses psychic powers when its forehead shimmers with light.

fields.Name: Mankey
fields.Pokedex: When it starts shaking and its nasal breathing turns rough, it's a sure sign of anger. However, since this happens instantly, there is no time to flee.

fields.Name: Primeape
fields.Pokedex: When it becomes furious, its blood circulation becomes more robust, and its muscles are made stronger. But it also becomes much less intelligent.

fields.Name: Growlithe
fields.Pokedex: Its superb sense of smell ensures that this Pokémon won't forget any scent, no matter what. It uses its sense of smell to detect the emotions of others.

fields.Name: Arcanine
fields.Pokedex: This fleet-footed Pokémon is said to run over 6,200 miles in a single day and night. The fire that blazes wildly within its body is its source of power.

fields.Name: Poliwag
fields.Pokedex: It is possible to see this Pokémon's spiral innards right through its thin skin. However, the skin is also very flexible. Even sharp fangs bounce right off it.

fields.Name: Poliwhirl
fields.Pokedex: Its body surface is always wet and slick with an oily fluid. Because of this greasy covering, it can easily slip and slide out of the clutches of any enemy in battle.

fields.Name: Poliwrath
fields.Pokedex: Its highly developed muscles never grow fatigued, however much it exercises. This Pokémon can swim back and forth across the Pacific Ocean without effort.

fields.Name: Abra
fields.Pokedex: A Pokémon that sleeps 18 hours a day. Observation revealed that it uses Teleport to change its location once every hour.

fields.Name: Kadabra
fields.Pokedex: It is rumored that a boy with psychic abilities suddenly transformed into Kadabra while he was assisting research into extrasensory powers.

fields.Name: Alakazam
fields.Pokedex: While it has strong psychic abilities and high intelligence, an Alakazam's muscles are very weak. It uses psychic power to move its body.

fields.Name: Machop
fields.Pokedex: It continually undertakes strenuous training to master all forms of martial arts. Its strength lets it easily hoist a sumo wrestler onto its shoulders.

fields.Name: Machoke
fields.Pokedex: A belt is worn by a Machoke to keep its overwhelming power under control. Because it is so dangerous, no one has ever removed the belt.

fields.Name: Machamp
fields.Pokedex: It is impossible to defend against punches and chops doled out by its four arms. Its fighting spirit flares up when it faces a tough opponent.

fields.Name: Bellsprout
fields.Pokedex: A Bellsprout's thin and flexible body lets it bend and sway to avoid any attack, however strong it may be. From its mouth, it leaks a fluid that melts even iron.

fields.Name: Weepinbell
fields.Pokedex: At night, a Weepinbell hangs on to a tree branch with its hooked rear and sleeps. If it moves around in its sleep, it may wake up to find itself on the ground.

fields.Name: Victreebel
fields.Pokedex: The long vine extending from its head is waved about as if it were a living thing to attract prey. When an unsuspecting victim approaches, it is swallowed whole.

fields.Name: Tentacool
fields.Pokedex: Its body is almost entirely composed of water. It ensnares its foe with its two long tentacles, then stabs with the poison stingers at their tips.

fields.Name: Tentacruel
fields.Pokedex: It lives in complex rock formations on the ocean floor and traps prey using its 80 tentacles. Its red orbs glow when it grows excited or agitated.

fields.Name: Geodude
fields.Pokedex: It climbs mountain paths using only the power of its arms. Because they look just like boulders lining paths, hikers may step on them without noticing.

fields.Name: Graveler
fields.Pokedex: They descend from mountains by tumbling down steep slopes. They are so brutal, they smash aside obstructing trees and massive boulders with thunderous tackles.

fields.Name: Golem
fields.Pokedex: It is said to live in volcanic craters on mountain peaks. Once a year, it sheds its hide and grows larger. The shed hide crumbles and returns to the soil.

fields.Name: Ponyta
fields.Pokedex: A Ponyta is very weak at birth. It can barely stand up. Its legs become stronger as it stumbles and falls while trying to keep up with its parent.

fields.Name: Rapidash
fields.Pokedex: It usually canters casually in the fields and plains. But once a Rapidash turns serious, its fiery manes flare and blaze as it gallops its way up to 150 mph.

fields.Name: Slowpoke
fields.Pokedex: It catches prey by dipping its tail in water at the side of a river. But it often forgets what it is doing and spends entire days just loafing at water's edge.

fields.Name: Slowbro
fields.Pokedex: Its tail has a Shellder firmly attached with a bite. As a result, the tail can't be used for fishing anymore. This forces it to reluctantly swim and catch prey.

fields.Name: Magnemite
fields.Pokedex: The units at its sides are extremely powerful magnets. They generate enough magnetism to draw in iron objects from over 300 feet away.

fields.Name: Magneton
fields.Pokedex: It is actually three Magnemite linked by magnetism. It generates powerful radio waves that raise temperatures by 3.6 degrees F within a 3,300-foot radius.

fields.Name: Farfetch'd
fields.Pokedex: It is always seen with a stick from a plant. Apparently, there are good sticks and bad sticks. This Pokémon occasionally fights with others over choice sticks.

fields.Name: Doduo
fields.Pokedex: Even while eating or sleeping, one of the heads remains always vigilant for any sign of danger. When threatened, it flees at over 60 miles per hour.

fields.Name: Dodrio
fields.Pokedex: A peculiar Pokémon species with three heads. It vigorously races across grassy plains even in arid seasons with little rainfall.

fields.Name: Seel
fields.Pokedex: Seel hunt for prey in frigid, ice-covered seas. When it needs to breathe, it punches a hole through the ice with the sharply protruding section of its head.

fields.Name: Dewgong
fields.Pokedex: It loves to snooze on bitterly cold ice. The sight of this Pokémon sleeping on a glacier was mistakenly thought to be a mermaid by a mariner long ago.

fields.Name: Grimer
fields.Pokedex: Born from polluted sludge in the sea, Grimer's favorite food is anything filthy. They feed on wastewater pumped out from factories.

fields.Name: Muk
fields.Pokedex: It prefers warm and humid habitats. In the summertime, the toxic substances in its body intensify, making Muk reek like putrid kitchen garbage.

fields.Name: Shellder
fields.Pokedex: At night, it burrows a hole in the seafloor with its broad tongue to make a place to sleep. While asleep, it closes its shell, but leaves its tongue hanging out.

fields.Name: Cloyster
fields.Pokedex: It swims in the sea by swallowing water, then jetting it out toward the rear. The Cloyster shoots spikes from its shell using the same system.

fields.Name: Gastly
fields.Pokedex: When exposed to a strong wind, a Gastly's gaseous body quickly dwindles away. They cluster under the eaves of houses to escape the ravages of wind.

fields.Name: Haunter
fields.Pokedex: If a Haunter beckons you while it is floating in darkness, don't approach it. This Pokémon will try to lick you with its tongue and steal your life away.

fields.Name: Gengar
fields.Pokedex: Deep in the night, your shadow cast by a streetlight may suddenly overtake you. It is actually a Gengar running past you, pretending to be your shadow.

fields.Name: Onix
fields.Pokedex: There is a magnet in its brain that prevents an Onix from losing direction while tunneling. As it grows older, its body becomes steadily rounder and smoother.

fields.Name: Drowzee
fields.Pokedex: If your nose becomes itchy while you are sleeping, it's a sure sign that a Drowzee is standing above your pillow and trying to eat your dream through your nostrils.

fields.Name: Hypno
fields.Pokedex: The arcing movement and glitter of the pendulum in a Hypno's hand lull the foe into deep hypnosis. While searching for prey, it polishes the pendulum.

fields.Name: Krabby
fields.Pokedex: Presenta un dimorfismo sexual claro, en el macho los surcos ventrales forman un triángulo isósceles y en la hembra un triángulo redondeado.

fields.Name: Kingler
fields.Pokedex: Muda su concha para crecer, si pierde su pinza grande la opuesta crece más convirtiéndose en la grande y regenera la otra que pasa a ser la pequeña.

fields.Name: Voltorb
fields.Pokedex: It bears an uncanny and unexplained resemblance to a Poké Ball. Because it explodes at the slightest shock, even veteran trainers treat it with caution.

fields.Name: Electrode
fields.Pokedex: They appear in great numbers at electric power plants. Because they feed on electricity, they cause massive and chaotic blackouts in nearby cities.

fields.Name: Exeggcute
fields.Pokedex: It consists of six eggs that care for each other. The eggs attract each other and spin around. When cracks increasingly appear, it is close to evolution.

fields.Name: Exeggutor
fields.Pokedex: Originally from the tropics, Exeggutor's heads grow larger from exposure to strong sunlight. It is said that when the heads fall, they group to form an Exeggcute.

fields.Name: Cubone
fields.Pokedex: Ha tenido que sobrevivir en un ecosistema inhóspito, como el desierto, desde muy pequeño sin su madre. Por ello es muy duro y autosuficiente.

fields.Name: Marowak
fields.Pokedex: Usan su hueso para producir sonidos golpeando rocas para avisar a otros de que están invadiendo su territorio o para impresionar a las hembras.

fields.Name: Hitmonlee
fields.Pokedex: Its legs freely stretch and contract. Using these springlike limbs, it bowls over foes with devastating kicks. After battle, it rubs down its tired legs.

fields.Name: Hitmonchan
fields.Pokedex: A Hitmonchan is said to possess the spirit of a boxer who aimed to become the world champion. Having an indomitable spirit means that it will never give up.

fields.Name: Lickitung
fields.Pokedex: Whenever it sees something unfamiliar, it always licks the object because it memorizes things by texture and taste. It is somewhat put off by sour things.

fields.Name: Koffing
fields.Pokedex: Getting up close to a Koffing will give you a chance to observe, through its thin skin, the toxic gases swirling inside. It blows up at the slightest stimulation.

fields.Name: Weezing
fields.Pokedex: By diluting its toxic gases with a special process, the highest grade of perfume can be extracted. To Weezing, gases emanating from garbage are the ultimate feast.

fields.Name: Rhyhorn
fields.Pokedex: Once it starts running, it doesn't stop. Its tiny brain makes it so stupid that it can't remember why it started running in the first place.

fields.Name: Rhydon
fields.Pokedex: Its horn, which rotates like a drill, destroys tall buildings with one strike. It stands on its hind legs, and its brain is well developed.

fields.Name: Chansey
fields.Pokedex: Chansey lay nutritionally excellent eggs every day. The eggs are so delicious, they are eagerly devoured by even those who have lost their appetite.

fields.Name: Tangela
fields.Pokedex: Its vines snap off easily and painlessly if they are grabbed, allowing it to make a quick getaway. The lost vines are replaced by new growth the very next day.

fields.Name: Kangaskhan
fields.Pokedex: If you come across a young Kangaskhan playing by itself, never try to catch it. The baby's parent is sure to be in the area, and it will become violently enraged.

fields.Name: Horsea
fields.Pokedex: By cleverly flicking the fins on its back side to side, it moves in any direction while facing forward. It spits ink to escape if it senses danger.

fields.Name: Seadra
fields.Pokedex: The poisonous barbs all over its body are highly valued as ingredients for making traditional herbal medicine. It shows no mercy to anything approaching its nest.

fields.Name: Goldeen
fields.Pokedex: In the springtime, schools of Goldeen can be seen swimming up falls and rivers. It metes out staggering damage with its single horn.

fields.Name: Seaking
fields.Pokedex: It punches holes in boulders on stream- beds. This is a clever innovation that prevents its eggs from being attacked or washed away by the current.

fields.Name: Staryu
fields.Pokedex: It gathers with others in the night and makes its red core glow on and off with the twinkling stars. It can regenerate limbs if they are severed from its body.

fields.Name: Starmie
fields.Pokedex: People in ancient times imagined that Starmie were transformed from the reflections of stars that twinkled on gentle waves at night.

fields.Name: Mr. Mime
fields.Pokedex: A Mr. Mime is a master of pantomime. It can convince others that something unseeable actually exists. Once believed, the imaginary object does become real.

fields.Name: Scyther
fields.Pokedex: Its blindingly fast speed adds to the sharpness of its twin forearm scythes. The scythes can slice through thick logs in one wicked stroke.

fields.Name: Jynx
fields.Pokedex: Fueron traídas de las Américas para servir en algunos espectáculos de la corte. Con el tiempo se fueron adaptando al arte del sur de Iberia.

fields.Name: Electabuzz
fields.Pokedex: When a storm approaches, it competes with others to scale heights that are likely to be stricken by lightning. Some towns use Electabuzz in place of lightning rods.

fields.Name: Magmar
fields.Pokedex: In battle, it blows out intense flames from all over its body to intimidate its foe. These fiery bursts create heat waves that ignite grass and trees in the area.

fields.Name: Pinsir
fields.Pokedex: Their pincers are strong enough to shatter thick logs. Because they dislike cold, Pinsir burrow and sleep under the ground on chilly nights.

fields.Name: Tauros
fields.Pokedex: It is not satisfied unless it is rampaging at all times. If there is no opponent for Tauros to battle, it will charge at thick trees and knock them down to calm itself.

fields.Name: Magikarp
fields.Pokedex: Its swimming muscles are weak, so it is easily washed away by currents. In places where water pools, you can see many Magikarp deposited there by the flow.

fields.Name: Gyarados
fields.Pokedex: It is an extremely vicious and violent Pokémon. When humans begin to fight, it will appear and burn everything to the ground with intensely hot flames.

fields.Name: Lapras
fields.Pokedex: People have driven Lapras almost to the point of extinction. In the evenings, it is said to sing plaintively as it seeks what few others of its kind still remain.

fields.Name: Ditto
fields.Pokedex: A Ditto rearranges its cell structure to transform itself. However, if it tries to change based on its memory, it will get details wrong.

fields.Name: Eevee
fields.Pokedex: Tiene mecanismos celulares que inducen la producción de mutaciones en el genoma cuando es expuesto a diferentes estímulos, como forma de adaptación.

fields.Name: Vaporeon
fields.Pokedex: Muy ágil en tierra firme y en el agua gracias a su aleta caudal. Además de pulmones posee branquias alrededor del cuello para respirar bajo agua.

fields.Name: Jolteon
fields.Pokedex: Se mueve a una velocidad vertiginosa, gracias a lo cual se carga de electricidad estática por el rozamiento con el aire, erizándose así su pelaje.

fields.Name: Flareon
fields.Pokedex: Es pacífico, calmado y muy suave. El calor que produce depende de su estado de ánimo, produciendo más si está enfadado o asustado.

fields.Name: Porygon
fields.Pokedex: It is capable of reverting itself entirely back to program data in order to enter cyberspace. A Porygon is copy- protected so it cannot be duplicated.

fields.Name: Omanyte
fields.Pokedex: One of the ancient and long-since-extinct Pokémon that have been regenerated from fossils by humans. If attacked, it withdraws into its hard shell.

fields.Name: Omastar
fields.Pokedex: An Omastar uses its tentacles to capture its prey. It is believed to have become extinct because its shell grew too large, making its movements slow and ponderous.

fields.Name: Kabuto
fields.Pokedex: It is a Pokémon that has been regenerated from a fossil. However, in rare cases, living examples have been discovered. Kabuto have not changed for 300 million years.

fields.Name: Kabutops
fields.Pokedex: Kabutops once swam underwater to hunt for prey. It was apparently evolving from being a water dweller to living on land as evident from changes in its gills and legs.

fields.Name: Aerodactyl
fields.Pokedex: Aerodactyl is a Pokémon from the age of dinosaurs. It was regenerated from DNA extracted from amber. It is imagined to have been the king of the skies.

fields.Name: Snorlax
fields.Pokedex: Snorlax's typical day consists of nothing more than eating and sleeping. It is such a docile Pokémon that there are children who use its big belly as a place to play.

fields.Name: Articuno
fields.Pokedex: Articuno is a legendary bird Pokémon that can control ice. The flapping of its wings chills the air. As a result, it is said that when this Pokémon flies, snow will fall.

fields.Name: Zapdos
fields.Pokedex: Zapdos is a legendary bird Pokémon that has the ability to control electricity. It usually lives in thunderclouds. It gains power if it is stricken by lightning bolts.

fields.Name: Moltres
fields.Pokedex: Moltres is a legendary bird Pokémon that can control fire. If injured, it is said to dip its body in the molten magma of a volcano to burn and heal itself.

fields.Name: Dratini
fields.Pokedex: A Dratini continually molts and sloughs off its old skin. It does so because the life energy within its body steadily builds to reach uncontrollable levels.

fields.Name: Dragonair
fields.Pokedex: A Dragonair stores an enormous amount of energy inside its body. It is said to alter the weather around it by loosing energy from the crystals on its neck and tail.

fields.Name: Dragonite
fields.Pokedex: It can circle the globe in just 16 hours. It is a kindhearted Pokémon that leads lost and foundering ships in a storm to the safety of land.

fields.Name: Mewtwo
fields.Pokedex: A Pokémon that was created by genetic manipulation. However, even though the scientific power of humans made its body, they failed to give it a warm heart.

fields.Name: Mew
fields.Pokedex: A Mew is said to possess the genes of all Pokémon. It is capable of making itself invisible at will, so it entirely avoids notice even if it approaches people.

fields.Name: Chikorita
fields.Pokedex: It waves its leaf around to keep foes at bay. However, a sweet fragrance also wafts from the leaf, creating a friendly atmosphere that becalms the battlers.

fields.Name: Bayleef
fields.Pokedex: A Bayleef's neck is ringed by curled-up leaves. Inside each leaf is a small tree shoot. The fragrance of this shoot makes people peppy.

fields.Name: Meganium
fields.Pokedex: The fragrance of a Meganium's flower soothes and calms emotions. In battle, it gives off more of its becalming scent to blunt the foe's fighting spirit.

fields.Name: Cyndaquil
fields.Pokedex: It flares flames from its back to protect itself. The fire burns vigorously if the Pokémon is angry. When it is tired, it sputters with incomplete combustion.

fields.Name: Quilava
fields.Pokedex: It intimidates foes with intense gusts of flames and superheated air. Its quick nimbleness lets it dodge attacks even while scorching an enemy.

fields.Name: Typhlosion
fields.Pokedex: It can hide behind a shimmering heat haze that it creates using its intense flames. Typhlosion create blazing explosive blasts that burn everything to cinders.

fields.Name: Totodile
fields.Pokedex: Despite its small body, Totodile's jaws are very powerful. While it may think it is just playfully nipping, its bite has enough strength to cause serious injury.

fields.Name: Croconaw
fields.Pokedex: Once its jaws clamp down on its foe, it will absolutely not let go. Because the tips of its fangs are forked back like fishhooks, they become irremovably embedded.

fields.Name: Feraligatr
fields.Pokedex: It opens its huge mouth to intimidate enemies. In battle, it runs using its thick and powerful hind legs to charge the foe with incredible speed.

fields.Name: Sentret
fields.Pokedex: They take turns standing guard when it is time to sleep. The sentry awakens the others if it senses danger. If one becomes separated, it turns sleepless with fear.

fields.Name: Furret
fields.Pokedex: A Furret has a very slim build. When under attack, it can squirm through narrow spaces and get away. In spite of its short limbs, it is very nimble and fleet.

fields.Name: Hoothoot
fields.Pokedex: It has an internal organ that senses the earth's rotation. Using this special organ, a Hoothoot begins hooting at precisely the same time every day.

fields.Name: Noctowl
fields.Pokedex: It unfailingly catches prey in darkness. Noctowl owe their success to superior vision that allows them to see in minimal light, and to their supple and silent wings.

fields.Name: Ledyba
fields.Pokedex: Ledyba communicate using a fluid that they secrete from where the legs join the body. They are said to convey feelings to others by altering the fluid's scent.

fields.Name: Ledian
fields.Pokedex: It is said that in lands with clean air, where the stars fill the sky, there live many Ledian. For good reason, they use the light of the stars as energy.

fields.Name: Spinarak
fields.Pokedex: The web it spins can be considered its second nervous system. It is said that a Spinarak determines its prey by the tiny vibrations it feels through the web.

fields.Name: Ariados
fields.Pokedex: Its feet are tipped with tiny hooked claws that enable it to scuttle on ceilings and vertical walls. It constricts its foe with thin and strong silk webbing.

fields.Name: Crobat
fields.Pokedex: Over the course of evolution, its hind legs turned into wings. By alternately resting its front and rear wings, it can fly all day without having to stop.

fields.Name: Chinchou
fields.Pokedex: When it senses danger, it discharges positive and negative electricity from its two antennae. It lives in depths beyond sunlight's reach.

fields.Name: Lanturn
fields.Pokedex: The light-emitting orbs on its back are very bright. They are formed from a part of its dorsal fin. This Pokémon illuminates the inky darkness of deep seas.

fields.Name: Pichu
fields.Pokedex: It is still inept at retaining electricity. When it is startled, it discharges power accidentally. It gets better at holding power as it grows older.

fields.Name: Cleffa
fields.Pokedex: On nights with many shooting stars, Cleffa can be seen dancing in a ring. They dance until daybreak, when they quench their thirst with the morning dew.

fields.Name: Igglybuff
fields.Pokedex: Le gusta mucho cantar y cuida muy bien la salud de su garganta. Si tropieza empezará a rebotar como un balón de playa y le costará parar.

fields.Name: Togepi
fields.Pokedex: As its energy, it uses the feelings of compassion and pleasure exuded by people and Pokémon. It stores up happy feelings in its shell, then shares them out.

fields.Name: Togetic
fields.Pokedex: It is said to be a Pokémon that brings good fortune. When it spots someone who is pure of heart, a Togetic appears and shares its happiness with that person.

fields.Name: Natu
fields.Pokedex: It runs up short trees that grow on the savanna to peck at new shoots. A Natu's eyes look as if they are always observing something.

fields.Name: Xatu
fields.Pokedex: It has the enigmatic power of foreseeing the future. Some people in different lands have long believed that Xatu are emissaries from another world.

fields.Name: Mareep
fields.Pokedex: Its fluffy wool rubs together and builds a static charge. The more energy is charged, the more brightly the lightbulb at the tip of its tail glows.

fields.Name: Flaaffy
fields.Pokedex: Its fleece quality changes to generate strong static electricity with a small amount of wool. The bare, slick parts of its hide are shielded against electricity.

fields.Name: Ampharos
fields.Pokedex: It gives off so much light that it can be seen even from space. People in the old days used its light to send signals back and forth with others far away.

fields.Name: Bellossom
fields.Pokedex: Its flower petals deepen in color through exposure to sunlight. When cloudy weather persists, it does a dance that is thought to be a ritual for summoning the sun.

fields.Name: Marill
fields.Pokedex: Its body is covered with water-repellent fur. Because of the fur, it can swim through water at high speed without being slowed by the water's resistance.

fields.Name: Azumarill
fields.Pokedex: It lives in water virtually all day long. Its body color and pattern act as camouflage that makes it tough for enemies to spot in water.

fields.Name: Sudowoodo
fields.Pokedex: It mimics a tree to avoid being attacked by enemies. But since its forelegs remain green throughout the year, it is easily identified as a fake in the winter.

fields.Name: Politoed
fields.Pokedex: The curled hair on its head proves its status as a king. It is said that the longer and curlier the hair, the more respect it earns from its peers.

fields.Name: Hoppip
fields.Pokedex: This Pokémon drifts and floats with the wind. If it senses the approach of strong winds, a Hoppip links leaves with others to prepare against being blown away.

fields.Name: Skiploom
fields.Pokedex: It blossoms when the temperature rises above 64 degrees F. Because its flower's blooming changes with the temperature, it is sometimes used as a thermometer.

fields.Name: Jumpluff
fields.Pokedex: Jumpluff ride warm southern winds to cross the sea and fly to foreign lands. This Pokémon lands when it encounters cold air while it is floating.

fields.Name: Aipom
fields.Pokedex: Its tail ends with a dexterous, handlike appendage. However, because it uses the tail so much, Aipom's real hands have become rather clumsy.

fields.Name: Sunkern
fields.Pokedex: Sunkern try to minimize movement to conserve the nutrients they have stored in their bodies for evolution. They will not eat, subsisting only on morning dew.

fields.Name: Sunflora
fields.Pokedex: Sunflora convert solar energy into nutrition. They are highly active in the warm daytime but suddenly stop moving as soon as the sun sets.

fields.Name: Yanma
fields.Pokedex: It can see 360 degrees without moving its eyes. It is a great flier capable of making sudden stops and turning midair to quickly chase down targeted prey.

fields.Name: Wooper
fields.Pokedex: Wooper usually live in water but come out onto land seeking food occasionally. On land, they coat their bodies with a gooey, toxic film.

fields.Name: Quagsire
fields.Pokedex: A Quagsire hunts by leaving its mouth wide open in water and waiting for its prey to blunder in. Because it doesn't move, it does not get very hungry.

fields.Name: Espeon
fields.Pokedex: Su cola bífida le sirve para apoyarse y caminar a 2 patas o llegar más alto. Desarrolla grandes poderes psíquicos que potencia con la gema de su frente.

fields.Name: Umbreon
fields.Pokedex: Está completamente adaptado a la vida nocturna, pudiendo ver incluso mejor de noche que de día. Puede ocultarse perfectamente en la oscuridad.

fields.Name: Murkrow
fields.Pokedex: Murkrow were feared as the alleged bearers of ill fortune. It shows strong interest in anything that sparkles. It will even try to steal rings from women.

fields.Name: Slowking
fields.Pokedex: It undertakes research every day to solve the mysteries of the world. However, it apparently forgets everything if the Shellder on its head comes off.

fields.Name: Misdreavus
fields.Pokedex: A Misdreavus frightens people with a creepy, sobbing cry. It apparently uses its red spheres to absorb the fear of foes as its nutrition.

fields.Name: Unown
fields.Pokedex: This Pokémon is shaped like ancient text characters. Although research is ongoing, it is a mystery as to which came first, the ancient writings or the various Unown.

fields.Name: Wobbuffet
fields.Pokedex: Usually docile, a Wobbuffet strikes back ferociously if its black tail is attacked. It makes its lair in caves where it waits for nightfall.

fields.Name: Girafarig
fields.Pokedex: A Girafarig is an herbivore--it eats grass and tree shoots. While it is eating, its tail makes chewing and swallowing motions as if it were also eating.

fields.Name: Pineco
fields.Pokedex: A Pineco hangs from a tree branch and waits for prey. While eating, if it is disturbed by someone shaking its tree, it falls on the ground and suddenly explodes.

fields.Name: Forretress
fields.Pokedex: It keeps itself inside its steel shell. The shell is opened when it is catching prey, but it is so quick that the shell's inside cannot be seen.

fields.Name: Dunsparce
fields.Pokedex: Its drill-tipped tail is used to burrow into the ground backwards. This Pokémon is known to make its nest in complex shapes deep under the ground.

fields.Name: Gligar
fields.Pokedex: It glides without making a single sound. It grasps the face of its foe using its hind and large front claws, then stabs with its poison barb.

fields.Name: Steelix
fields.Pokedex: Steelix live even further underground than Onix. This Pokémon is known to dig toward the earth's core, reaching a depth of over six-tenths of a mile underground.

fields.Name: Snubbull
fields.Pokedex: By baring its fangs and making a scary face, it sends smaller Pokémon scurrying in terror. The Snubbull does seem a little sad at making its foes flee.

fields.Name: Granbull
fields.Pokedex: It has a particularly well-developed lower jaw. The huge fangs are heavy, causing it to tilt its head. Unless it is startled, it will not try to bite.

fields.Name: Qwilfish
fields.Pokedex: A Qwilfish uses the pressure of water it swallows to shoot toxic quills all at once from all over its body. It finds swimming to be somewhat challenging.

fields.Name: Scizor
fields.Pokedex: A Scizor has a body with the hardness of steel. It is not easily fazed by ordinary sorts of attacks. It flaps its wings to regulate its body temperature.

fields.Name: Shuckle
fields.Pokedex: A Shuckle hides under rocks, keeping its body concealed inside its shell while eating stored berries. The berries mix with its body fluids to become a juice.

fields.Name: Heracross
fields.Pokedex: They gather in forests seeking the sweet sap of trees. It is completely clad in a steel-hard shell. It is proud of its horn, which it uses to fling foes.

fields.Name: Sneasel
fields.Pokedex: A Sneasel scales trees by punching its hooked claws into the bark. It seeks out unguarded nests and steals eggs for food while the parents are away.

fields.Name: Teddiursa
fields.Pokedex: It licks its palms that are sweetened by being soaked in honey. A Teddiursa makes its own honey by blending fruits and pollen collected by Beedrill.

fields.Name: Ursaring
fields.Pokedex: In forests, it is said that there are many streams and towering trees where an Ursaring gathers food. It walks through its forest collecting food every day.

fields.Name: Slugma
fields.Pokedex: It is a species of Pokémon that lives in volcanic areas. If its body cools, its skin hardens and immobilizes it. To avoid that, it sleeps near magma.

fields.Name: Magcargo
fields.Pokedex: The shell on its back is made of hardened magma. Tens of thousands of years spent living in volcanic craters have turned Magcargo's bodies into magma.

fields.Name: Swinub
fields.Pokedex: It roots for food by rubbing its snout against the ground. Its favorite food is a mushroom that grows under dried grass. It occasionally roots out hot springs.

fields.Name: Piloswine
fields.Pokedex: A Piloswine is covered by a thick coat of long hair for enduring freezing cold. It uses its tusks to dig up food that has been buried under ice.

fields.Name: Corsola
fields.Pokedex: Corsola live in warm southern seas. If the sea becomes polluted, the beautiful coral stalks become discolored and crumble away in tatters.

fields.Name: Remoraid
fields.Pokedex: A Remoraid uses its abdominal muscles to forcefully expel swallowed water, then shoot down flying prey. When evolution approaches, it travels down rivers.

fields.Name: Octillery
fields.Pokedex: It ensnares its foe with its suction- cupped tentacles before delivering the finishing blow. If the foe turns out to be too strong, it spews ink to escape.

fields.Name: Delibird
fields.Pokedex: It carries food bundled up in its tail. There was a famous explorer who managed to scale Mt. Everest thanks to a Delibird sharing its food.

fields.Name: Mantine
fields.Pokedex: On sunny days, schools of Mantine can be seen elegantly leaping over the waves. It is not bothered by the Remoraid that hitches rides.

fields.Name: Skarmory
fields.Pokedex: A Pokémon that has a body and wings of steel. People in the past used feathers fallen from Skarmory to make swords and knives.

fields.Name: Houndour
fields.Pokedex: Houndour communicate with each other using a variety of cries to corner their prey. This Pokémon's remarkable teamwork is simply unparalleled.

fields.Name: Houndoom
fields.Pokedex: In a Houndoom pack, the one with its horns raked sharply back serves a leadership role. They choose their leader by fighting among themselves.

fields.Name: Kingdra
fields.Pokedex: It sleeps quietly, deep on the seafloor. When it comes up to the surface, it creates a huge whirlpool that can swallow even ships.

fields.Name: Phanpy
fields.Pokedex: Phanpy's big ears serve as broad fans. When it becomes hot, it flaps the ears busily to cool down. Even the young are very strong.

fields.Name: Donphan
fields.Pokedex: A Donphan is so strong it can easily haul a dump truck. Its hide has toughened to a rock-hard state. An ordinary sort of attack won't even leave a scratch.

fields.Name: Porygon2
fields.Pokedex: It was created by humans using the power of science. It has been given artificial intelligence that enables it to learn new gestures and emotions on its own.

fields.Name: Stantler
fields.Pokedex: Stantler's magnificent antlers were once traded at high prices as works of art. As a result, this Pokémon was hunted close to extinction.

fields.Name: Smeargle
fields.Pokedex: A Smeargle marks its territory using a fluid that leaks out from the tip of its tail. About 5,000 different marks left by this Pokémon have been found.

fields.Name: Tyrogue
fields.Pokedex: Tyrogue become stressed out if they do not get to train every day. When raising this Pokémon, the trainer must establish a regular training schedule.

fields.Name: Hitmontop
fields.Pokedex: Its technique of kicking while spinning is a remarkable mix of both offense and defense. Hitmontop travel faster spinning than they do walking.

fields.Name: Smoochum
fields.Pokedex: Es muy presumida y desde pequeña aprende el arte del coqueteo para llamar la atención y conseguir lo que quiere mostrándose adorable.

fields.Name: Elekid
fields.Pokedex: If it touches metal and discharges the electricity it has stored in its body, an Elekid begins swinging its arms in circles to recharge itself.

fields.Name: Magby
fields.Pokedex: If a Magby is spouting yellow flames from its mouth, it is in good health. When it is fatigued, black smoke will be mixed in with the flames.

fields.Name: Miltank
fields.Pokedex: It gives over five gallons of milk daily. Its sweet milk is enjoyed by children and grown-ups alike. People who can't drink milk turn it into yogurt and eat it instead.

fields.Name: Blissey
fields.Pokedex: If it senses sadness with its fluffy fur, a Blissey will rush over to the sad person, however far away, to share an egg of happiness that brings a smile to any face.

fields.Name: Raikou
fields.Pokedex: Raikou embodies the speed of lightning. Its roars send shock waves shuddering through the air and ground as if lightning bolts were crashing down.

fields.Name: Entei
fields.Pokedex: Entei embodies the passion of magma. It is thought to have been born in the eruption of a volcano. It blasts fire that consumes all that it touches.

fields.Name: Suicune
fields.Pokedex: Suicune embodies the compassion of a pure spring of water. It runs across the land with gliding elegance. It has the power to purify dirty water.

fields.Name: Larvitar
fields.Pokedex: A Larvitar is born deep under the ground. It must eat its way through the soil above and reach the surface for it to see its parents' faces.

fields.Name: Pupitar
fields.Pokedex: A Pupitar creates a gas inside its body that it ejects under compression to propel itself like a jet. Its body can withstand a collision with solid steel.

fields.Name: Tyranitar
fields.Pokedex: A Tyranitar is so overwhelmingly powerful, it can bring down a whole mountain to make its nest. It roams in mountains seeking new opponents to fight.

fields.Name: Lugia
fields.Pokedex: Lugia is so powerful even a light fluttering of its wings can blow apart houses. As a result, it chooses to live out of sight deep under the sea.

fields.Name: Ho-Oh
fields.Pokedex: Its feathers--which glow in seven colors depending on the angle at which they are struck by light--are thought to bring joy. It is said to live at the foot of a rainbow.

fields.Name: Celebi
fields.Pokedex: This Pokémon came from the future by crossing over time. It is thought that so long as Celebi appears, a bright and shining future awaits us.

fields.Name: Treecko
fields.Pokedex: It makes its nest in a giant tree in the forest. It ferociously guards against anything nearing its territory. It is said to be the protector of the forest's trees.

fields.Name: Grovyle
fields.Pokedex: Leaves grow out of this Pokémon's body. They help obscure a Grovyle from the eyes of its enemies while it is in a thickly overgrown forest.

fields.Name: Sceptile
fields.Pokedex: In the jungle, its power is without equal. This Pokémon carefully grows trees and plants. It regulates its body temperature by basking in sunlight.

fields.Name: Torchic
fields.Pokedex: If attacked, it strikes back by spitting balls of fire it forms in its stomach. A Torchic dislikes darkness because it can't see its surroundings.

fields.Name: Combusken
fields.Pokedex: It lashes out with 10 kicks per second. Its strong fighting instinct compels it to keep up its offensive until the opponent gives up.

fields.Name: Blaziken
fields.Pokedex: It learns martial arts that use punches and kicks. Every several years, its old feathers burn off, and new, supple feathers grow back in their place.

fields.Name: Mudkip
fields.Pokedex: On land, it can powerfully lift large boulders by planting its four feet and heaving. It sleeps by burying itself in soil at the water's edge.

fields.Name: Marshtomp
fields.Pokedex: Its toughened hind legs enable it to stand upright. Because it weakens if its skin dries out, it replenishes fluids by playing in mud.

fields.Name: Swampert
fields.Pokedex: If it senses the approach of a storm and a tidal wave, it protects its seaside nest by piling up boulders. It swims as fast as a jet ski.

fields.Name: Poochyena
fields.Pokedex: It savagely threatens foes with bared fangs. It chases after fleeing targets tenaciously. It turns tail and runs, however, if the foe strikes back.

fields.Name: Mightyena
fields.Pokedex: In the wild, Mightyena live in a pack. They never defy their leader's orders. They defeat foes with perfectly coordinated teamwork.

fields.Name: Zigzagoon
fields.Pokedex: Rubbing its nose against the ground, it always wanders about back and forth in search of something. It is distinguished by the zigzag footprints it leaves.

fields.Name: Linoone
fields.Pokedex: It is exceedingly fast if it only has to run in a straight line. When it spots pond- dwelling prey underwater, it quickly leaps in and catches it with its sharp claws.

fields.Name: Wurmple
fields.Pokedex: It sticks to tree branches and eats leaves. The thread it spits from its mouth, which becomes gooey when it touches air, slows the movement of its foes.

fields.Name: Silcoon
fields.Pokedex: It prepares for evolution using the energy it stored while it was a Wurmple. It keeps watch over the surroundings with its two eyes.

fields.Name: Beautifly
fields.Pokedex: Its colorfully patterned wings are its most prominent feature. It flies through flower-covered fields collecting pollen. It attacks ferociously when angered.

fields.Name: Cascoon
fields.Pokedex: To avoid detection by its enemies, it hides motionlessly beneath large leaves and in the gaps of branches. It also attaches dead leaves to its body for camouflage.

fields.Name: Dustox
fields.Pokedex: It is a nocturnal Pokémon that flies from fields and mountains to the attraction of streetlights at night. It looses highly toxic powder from its wings.

fields.Name: Lotad
fields.Pokedex: This Pokémon lives in ponds with clean water. It is known to ferry small Pokémon across ponds by carrying them on the broad leaf on its head.

fields.Name: Lombre
fields.Pokedex: In the evening, it takes great delight in popping out of rivers and startling people. It feeds on aquatic moss that grows on rocks in the riverbed.

fields.Name: Ludicolo
fields.Pokedex: When it hears festive music, all the cells in its body become stimulated, and it begins moving in rhythm. It does not quail even when it faces a tough opponent.

fields.Name: Seedot
fields.Pokedex: Es presa de varios Pokémon por lo que suelen colgarse de árboles y ocultarse entre las hojas para absorber la savia elaborada sin peligro.

fields.Name: Nuzleaf
fields.Pokedex: Usa la hoja de su cabeza para soplar y realizar sonidos diversos que le sirven para comunicarse entre ellos, confundir a sus enemigos, etc.

fields.Name: Shiftry
fields.Pokedex: Lidera grupos de Nuzleaf y se preocupa por sus compañeros. Puede usar los abanicos de sus brazos para planear o provocar fuertes vientos.

fields.Name: Taillow
fields.Pokedex: Although it is small, it is very courageous. It will take on a larger Skarmory on an equal footing. However, its will weakens if it becomes hungry.

fields.Name: Swellow
fields.Pokedex: A Swellow dives upon prey from far above. It never misses its targets. It takes to the skies in search of lands with a warm climate.

fields.Name: Wingull
fields.Pokedex: It makes its nest on a sheer cliff at the edge of the sea. It has trouble keeping its wings flapping in flight. Instead, it soars on updrafts.

fields.Name: Pelipper
fields.Pokedex: It skims the tops of waves as it flies. When it spots prey, it uses its large beak to scoop up the victim with water. It protects its eggs in its beak.

fields.Name: Ralts
fields.Pokedex: A Ralts has the power to sense the emotions of people and Pokémon with the horns on its head. It takes cover if it senses any hostility.

fields.Name: Kirlia
fields.Pokedex: A Kirlia has the psychic power to create a rip in the dimensions and see into the future. It is said to dance with pleasure on sunny mornings.

fields.Name: Gardevoir
fields.Pokedex: It apparently does not feel the pull of gravity because it supports itself with psychic power. It will give its life to protect its trainer.

fields.Name: Surskit
fields.Pokedex: They gather on puddles after evening downpours, gliding across the surface of water as if sliding. It secretes honey with a sweet aroma from its head.

fields.Name: Masquerain
fields.Pokedex: It intimidates foes with the large eyelike patterns on its antennae. Because it can't fly if its wings get wet, it shelters itself from rain under large trees and eaves.

fields.Name: Shroomish
fields.Pokedex: It loves to eat damp, composted soil in forests. If you enter a forest after a long rain, you can see many Shroomish feasting on composted soil.

fields.Name: Breloom
fields.Pokedex: It scatters spores from holes in the cap on its head. It loves warm and humid climates. It feeds on trees and plants in fields and forests.

fields.Name: Slakoth
fields.Pokedex: It sleeps virtually all day and night long. It doesn't change its nest its entire life, but it sometimes travels great distances by swimming in rivers.

fields.Name: Vigoroth
fields.Pokedex: It can't keep still because its blood boils with energy. It runs through the fields and mountains all day to calm itself. If it doesn't, it can't sleep at night.

fields.Name: Slaking
fields.Pokedex: Hordes of Slaking gather around trees when fruits come into season. They wait around patiently for ripened fruits to fall out of the trees.

fields.Name: Nincada
fields.Pokedex: It makes its nest at the roots of a mighty tree. Using its whiskerlike antennae, it probes its surroundings in the pitch-black darkness of soil.

fields.Name: Ninjask
fields.Pokedex: Because it darts about vigorously at high speed, it is very difficult to see. Hearing its distinctive cries for too long induces a headache.

fields.Name: Shedinja
fields.Pokedex: A peculiar Pokémon that floats in air even though its wings remain completely still. The inside of its body is hollow and utterly dark.

fields.Name: Whismur
fields.Pokedex: Its cries equal a jet plane in volume. It inhales through its ear canals. Because of this system, it can cry continually without having to catch its breath.

fields.Name: Loudred
fields.Pokedex: It positions the round speakers on its head to assail foes with ultrasonic waves at massive volume. It builds power by stomping the ground.

fields.Name: Exploud
fields.Pokedex: It has sound-generating organs all over its body. It communicates with others by adjusting the tone and volume of the cries it emits.

fields.Name: Makuhita
fields.Pokedex: It loves to toughen up its body above all else. If you hear quaking rumbles in a cave, it is the sound of Makuhita undertaking strenuous training.

fields.Name: Hariyama
fields.Pokedex: It has the habit of challenging others without hesitation to tests of strength. It's been known to stand on train tracks and stop trains using forearm thrusts.

fields.Name: Azurill
fields.Pokedex: Its tail, which is packed with nutrition, is very bouncy like a rubber ball. On sunny days they gather at the edge of water and splash about for fun.

fields.Name: Nosepass
fields.Pokedex: Its body emits a powerful magnetism. It feeds on prey that is pulled in by the force. Its magnetism is stronger in cold seasons.

fields.Name: Skitty
fields.Pokedex: A Skitty's adorably cute behavior makes it highly popular. In battle, it makes its tail puff out. It threatens foes with a sharp growl.

fields.Name: Delcatty
fields.Pokedex: Rather than keeping a permanent lair, it habitually seeks comfortable spots and sleeps there. It is nocturnal and becomes active at dusk.

fields.Name: Sableye
fields.Pokedex: It digs branching holes in caves using its sharp claws in search of food--raw gems. A Sableye lurks in darkness and is seen only rarely.

fields.Name: Mawile
fields.Pokedex: Its giant jaws are actually steel horns that transformed. It fools foes into complacency with its adorable gestures, then chomps them with its huge jaws.

fields.Name: Aron
fields.Pokedex: A Pokémon that is clad in steel armor. A new suit of armor is made when it evolves. The old, discarded armor is salvaged as metal for making iron products.

fields.Name: Lairon
fields.Pokedex: When two Lairon meet in the wild, they fight for territory by bashing into each other with their steel bodies. The sound of their collision carries for miles.

fields.Name: Aggron
fields.Pokedex: Its iron horns grow longer a little at a time. They are used to determine the Aggron's age. The gouges in its armor are worn with pride as mementos from battles.

fields.Name: Meditite
fields.Pokedex: It continually meditates for hours every day. As a result of rigorous and dedicated yoga training, it has tempered its spiritual power so much it can fly.

fields.Name: Medicham
fields.Pokedex: Through crushingly harsh yoga training, it gained the power to foretell its foe's actions. It battles with elegant, dance- like movement.

fields.Name: Electrike
fields.Pokedex: It generates electricity using friction from the atmosphere. In seasons with especially arid air, its entire body blazes with violent showers of sparks.

fields.Name: Manectric
fields.Pokedex: Because lightning falls in their vicinities, Manectric were thought to have been born from lightning. In battle, they create thunderclouds.

fields.Name: Plusle
fields.Pokedex: It has the trait of cheering on its fellow Pokémon. By shorting out the electricity it releases from its paws, it creates pom-poms for cheering.

fields.Name: Minun
fields.Pokedex: At a meeting of Pokémon academics, it was announced that simultaneous exposure to electricity from a Plusle and Minun will promote circulation and boost vitality.

fields.Name: Volbeat
fields.Pokedex: With their taillights lit, Volbeat fly in a swarm, drawing geometric designs in the night sky. They move their nests if their pond water becomes dirty.

fields.Name: Illumise
fields.Pokedex: A nocturnal Pokémon that becomes active upon nightfall. It leads a Volbeat swarm to draw patterns in the night sky. Over 200 different patterns have been confirmed.

fields.Name: Roselia
fields.Pokedex: A Roselia that drinks nutritionally rich springwater blooms with lovely flowers. The fragrance of its flowers has the effect of making its foes careless.

fields.Name: Gulpin
fields.Pokedex: This Pokémon's stomach fluid can even digest scrap iron. In one gulp, it can swallow something that is as large as itself.

fields.Name: Swalot
fields.Pokedex: Its powerful stomach acid is capable of digesting almost anything. The one thing in the whole world a Swalot can't digest is its own stomach.

fields.Name: Carvanha
fields.Pokedex: Carvanha attack ships in swarms, making them sink. Although it is said to be a very vicious Pokémon, it timidly flees as soon as it finds itself alone.

fields.Name: Sharpedo
fields.Pokedex: The vicious and sly gangster of the sea. Its skin is specially textured to minimize drag in water. Its speed tops out at over 75 miles per hour.

fields.Name: Wailmer
fields.Pokedex: While this Pokémon usually lives in the sea, it can survive on land, although not too long. It loses vitality if its body becomes dried out.

fields.Name: Wailord
fields.Pokedex: It breathes through nostrils that it raises above the sea. By inhaling to its maximum capacity, a Wailord can dive close to 10,000 feet beneath the waves.

fields.Name: Numel
fields.Pokedex: A Numel stores boiling magma in the hump on its back. It is a hardy Pokémon that can transport a 220-pound load. It has served humans at work since long ago.

fields.Name: Camerupt
fields.Pokedex: A Pokémon that lives in the crater of a volcano. Every 10 years, the volcanoes on its back erupt violently. Research is under way on the cause of eruption.

fields.Name: Torkoal
fields.Pokedex: It battles using energy it gets from burning coal. When loosing smoke from its nostrils, it lets off a sound that is similar to a locomotive's horn.

fields.Name: Spoink
fields.Pokedex: A Pokémon that manipulates psychic power at will. It doesn't stop bouncing even when it is asleep. It loves eating mushrooms that grow underground.

fields.Name: Grumpig
fields.Pokedex: It stores power in the black pearls on its forehead. When it uses psychic power, it performs an odd dance step. Its style of dancing became hugely popular overseas.

fields.Name: Spinda
fields.Pokedex: It is distinguished by a pattern of spots that is always different. Its unsteady, tottering walk has the effect of fouling its foe's aim.

fields.Name: Trapinch
fields.Pokedex: Its big jaws crunch through boulders. Because its head is so big, it has a hard time getting back upright if it tips over onto its back.

fields.Name: Vibrava
fields.Pokedex: It looses ultrasonic waves by rubbing its wings together. Since a Vibrava's wings are still in the process of growing, it can only fly short distances.

fields.Name: Flygon
fields.Pokedex: The flapping of its wings sounds like singing. To prevent detection by enemies, it hides itself by flapping up a cloud of desert sand.

fields.Name: Cacnea
fields.Pokedex: Cacnea live in deserts with virtually no rainfall. It battles by swinging its thick, spiked arms. Once a year, a yellow flower blooms.

fields.Name: Cacturne
fields.Pokedex: After spending thousands of years in harsh deserts, its blood transformed into the same substances as sand. It is nocturnal, so it hunts at night.

fields.Name: Swablu
fields.Pokedex: A Pokémon that has wings like cottony clouds. After enduring winter, in which little food is available, Swablu flocks move closer to towns in the spring.

fields.Name: Altaria
fields.Pokedex: It hums in a beautiful soprano voice. It flies among white clouds in the blue sky. It launches intensely hot fireballs from its mouth.

fields.Name: Zangoose
fields.Pokedex: When it battles, it stands on its hind legs and attacks with its sharply clawed forelegs. Its fur bristles if it encounters any Seviper.

fields.Name: Seviper
fields.Pokedex: Seviper and Zangoose are eternal rivals. It counters a Zangoose's dazzling agility with its swordlike tail, which also oozes a horrible poison.

fields.Name: Lunatone
fields.Pokedex: It becomes very active on the night of a full moon. This Pokémon was first discovered 40 years ago at the site of a meteor strike.

fields.Name: Solrock
fields.Pokedex: Solar energy is the source of this Pokémon's power. On sunny days, groups of Solrock line up facing the sun and absorb its light.

fields.Name: Barboach
fields.Pokedex: Its body is covered with a slimy film. The film acts as a barrier to prevent germs in muddy water from entering the Barboach's body.

fields.Name: Whiscash
fields.Pokedex: Mysteriously, it can foretell earthquakes. In the daytime, it sleeps in mud at the bottom of a pond. When it awakens, it continually feeds throughout the night.

fields.Name: Corphish
fields.Pokedex: Once it grips prey with its large pincers, it will never let go, no matter what. It is a hardy Pokémon that can thrive in any environment.

fields.Name: Crawdaunt
fields.Pokedex: A brutish Pokémon that loves to battle. A veteran Crawdaunt that has prevailed in hundreds of battles has giant pincers marked with countless scars.

fields.Name: Baltoy
fields.Pokedex: A Baltoy moves by spinning on its single foot. It has been depicted in murals adorning the walls of a once-bustling city in an ancient age.

fields.Name: Claydol
fields.Pokedex: A Claydol sleeps while hovering in midair. Its arms are separate from its body. They are kept floating by the Pokémon's manipulation of psychic power.

fields.Name: Lileep
fields.Pokedex: It disguises itself as seaweed by making its tentacles sway. Unsuspecting prey that come too close are swallowed whole. It became extinct 100 million years ago.

fields.Name: Cradily
fields.Pokedex: It drags its heavy body along the seafloor. It makes its nest in the shallows of warm seas. Cradily can be seen on beaches when the tide goes out.

fields.Name: Anorith
fields.Pokedex: It was resurrected from a fossil using the power of science. It swims by undulating the eight wings at its sides. They were feet that adapted to life in the sea.

fields.Name: Armaldo
fields.Pokedex: Armaldo usually lives on land. However, when it hunts for prey, it dives beneath the ocean. It swims around using its two large wings.

fields.Name: Feebas
fields.Pokedex: Feebas live in ponds that are heavily infested with weeds. Because of its hopelessly shabby appearance, it seems as if few trainers raise it.

fields.Name: Milotic
fields.Pokedex: It is said to live at the bottom of large lakes. Considered to be the most beautiful of all Pokémon, it has been depicted in paintings and statues.

fields.Name: Castform
fields.Pokedex: It alters its form depending on the weather. Changes in the climate such as the temperature and humidity appear to affect its cellular structure.

fields.Name: Kecleon
fields.Pokedex: A Pokémon that has the ability to alter its body colors to match its surroundings. A Kecleon reverts to its original colors if it is startled.

fields.Name: Shuppet
fields.Pokedex: This Pokémon roams about deep in the night seeking such negative emotions as grudges and envy. It retreats to its nest when the sun begins to rise.

fields.Name: Banette
fields.Pokedex: An abandoned plush doll became this Pokémon. They are said to live in garbage dumps and wander about in search of the children that threw them away.

fields.Name: Duskull
fields.Pokedex: A glare from its single scarlet eye makes even burly grown-ups freeze in utter fear. It is a nocturnal Pokémon that roams about under the cloak of darkness.

fields.Name: Dusclops
fields.Pokedex: It is thought that its body is hollow with only a spectral ball of fire burning inside. However, no one has been able to confirm this theory as fact.

fields.Name: Tropius
fields.Pokedex: It flies by flapping its broad leaves. The bunch of fruit that grows around its neck is deliciously sweet. In the spring, it scatters pollen from its neck.

fields.Name: Chimecho
fields.Pokedex: They fly about very actively when the hot season arrives. They communicate among themselves using seven different and distinguishing cries.

fields.Name: Absol
fields.Pokedex: It sharply senses even subtle changes in the sky and the land to predict natural disasters. It is a long-lived Pokémon that has a life-span of 100 years.

fields.Name: Wynaut
fields.Pokedex: A Wynaut loves to eat sweet fruits. It cleverly picks fruits using its earlike arms. They gather in fruit gardens, drawn by the fragrance.

fields.Name: Snorunt
fields.Pokedex: They tend to move about in groups of around five Snorunt. In snowy regions, it is said that when they are seen late at night, snowfall will arrive by morning.

fields.Name: Glalie
fields.Pokedex: A Glalie has the power to instantaneously freeze moisture in the atmosphere. A dazzling cloud of diamondlike ice crystals forms around its body.

fields.Name: Spheal
fields.Pokedex: It is completely covered with plushy fur. As a result, it never feels the cold even when it is rolling about on ice floes or diving in the sea.

fields.Name: Sealeo
fields.Pokedex: Sealeo live in herds on ice floes. Using its powerful flippers, it shatters ice. It dives into the sea to hunt prey five times a day.

fields.Name: Walrein
fields.Pokedex: To protect its herd, the leader battles anything that invades its territory, even at the cost of its life. Its tusks may snap off in battle.

fields.Name: Clamperl
fields.Pokedex: A Clamperl slams its shell closed on prey to prevent escape. The pearl it creates upon evolution is said to be infused with a mysterious energy.

fields.Name: Huntail
fields.Pokedex: To withstand the crushing pressure of water deep under the sea, its spine is very thick and sturdy. Its tail, which is shaped like a small fish, has eyes that light up.

fields.Name: Gorebyss
fields.Pokedex: A Gorebyss siphons the body fluids of prey through its thin, tubular mouth. Its light pink body color turns vivid when it finishes feeding.

fields.Name: Relicanth
fields.Pokedex: A Pokémon that was once believed to have been extinct. The species has not changed its form for 100 million years. It walks on the seafloor using its pectoral fins.

fields.Name: Luvdisc
fields.Pokedex: Luvdisc make the branches of Corsola their nests. There is a custom from long ago of giving a Luvdisc as a gift to express one's feelings of love.

fields.Name: Bagon
fields.Pokedex: Although it is small, this Pokémon is very powerful because its body is a bundle of muscles. It launches head-butts with its ironlike skull.

fields.Name: Shelgon
fields.Pokedex: It hardly eats while it awaits evolution. It becomes hardier by enduring hunger. Its shell peels off the instant it begins to evolve.

fields.Name: Salamence
fields.Pokedex: After many long years, its cellular structure underwent a sudden mutation to grow wings. When angered, it loses all thought and rampages out of control.

fields.Name: Beldum
fields.Pokedex: When Beldum gather in a swarm, they move in perfect unison as if they were but one Pokémon. They communicate with each other using brain waves.

fields.Name: Metang
fields.Pokedex: The claws tipping its arms pack the destructive power to tear through thick iron sheets as if they were silk. It flies at over 60 miles per hour.

fields.Name: Metagross
fields.Pokedex: Metagross has four brains that are joined by a complex neural network. As a result of integration, this Pokémon is smarter than a supercomputer.

fields.Name: Regirock
fields.Pokedex: A Pokémon that is made entirely of rocks and boulders. If parts of its body chip off in battle, Regirock repairs itself by adding new rocks.

fields.Name: Regice
fields.Pokedex: Its entire body is made of Antarctic ice. After extensive studies, researchers believe the ice was formed during an ice age.

fields.Name: Registeel
fields.Pokedex: Its body is harder than any other kind of metal. The body metal is composed of a mysterious substance. Not only is it hard, it shrinks and stretches flexibly.

fields.Name: Latias
fields.Pokedex: They make a small herd of only several members. They rarely make contact with people or other Pokémon. They disappear if they sense enemies.

fields.Name: Latios
fields.Pokedex: Even in hiding, it can detect the locations of others and sense their emotions since it has telepathy. Its intelligence allows it to understand human languages.

fields.Name: Kyogre
fields.Pokedex: Kyogre has appeared in mythology as the creator of the sea. After long years of feuding with Groudon, it took to sleep at the bottom of the sea.

fields.Name: Groudon
fields.Pokedex: Groudon has appeared in mythology as the creator of the land. It sleeps in magma underground and is said to make volcanoes erupt on awakening.

fields.Name: Rayquaza
fields.Pokedex: A Pokémon that flies endlessly in the ozone layer. It is said it would descend to the ground if Kyogre and Groudon were to fight.

fields.Name: Jirachi
fields.Pokedex: Jirachi is said to make wishes come true. While it sleeps, a tough crystalline shell envelops the body to protect it from enemies.

fields.Name: Deoxys
fields.Pokedex: A Pokémon that mutated from an extraterrestrial virus exposed to a laser beam. Its body is configured for superior agility and speed.

fields.Name: Turtwig
fields.Pokedex: Made from soil, the shell on its back hardens when it drinks water. It lives along lakes.

fields.Name: Grotle
fields.Pokedex: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.

fields.Name: Torterra
fields.Pokedex: Small Pokémon occasionally gather on its unmoving back to begin building their nests.

fields.Name: Chimchar
fields.Pokedex: It agilely scales sheer cliffs to live atop craggy mountains. Its fire is put out when it sleeps.

fields.Name: Monferno
fields.Pokedex: To intimidate attackers, it stretches the fire on its tail to make itself appear bigger.

fields.Name: Infernape
fields.Pokedex: It uses a special kind of martial arts involving all its limbs. Its fire never goes out.

fields.Name: Piplup
fields.Pokedex: Because it is very proud, it hates accepting food from people. Its thick down guards it from cold.

fields.Name: Prinplup
fields.Pokedex: It lives alone, away from others. Apparently, every one of them believes it is the most important.

fields.Name: Empoleon
fields.Pokedex: The three horns that extend from its beak attest to its power. The leader has the biggest horns.

fields.Name: Starly
fields.Pokedex: They flock in great numbers. Though small, they flap their wings with great power.

fields.Name: Staravia
fields.Pokedex: It flies around forests and fields in search of bug Pokémon. It stays within a huge flock.

fields.Name: Staraptor
fields.Pokedex: It has a savage nature. It will courageously challenge foes that are much larger.

fields.Name: Bidoof
fields.Pokedex: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.

fields.Name: Bibarel
fields.Pokedex: It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and mud. It is known as an industrious worker.

fields.Name: Kricketot
fields.Pokedex: It shakes its head back to front, causing its antennae to hit each other and sound like a xylophone.

fields.Name: Kricketune
fields.Pokedex: It crosses its knifelike arms in front of its chest when it cries. It can compose melodies ad lib.

fields.Name: Shinx
fields.Pokedex: All of its fur dazzles if danger is sensed. It flees while the foe is momentarily blinded.

fields.Name: Luxio
fields.Pokedex: Its claws loose electricity with enough amperage to cause fainting. They live in small groups.

fields.Name: Luxray
fields.Pokedex: It has eyes that can see through anything. It spots and captures prey hiding behind objects.

fields.Name: Budew
fields.Pokedex: Over the winter, it closes its bud and endures the cold. In spring, the bud opens and releases pollen.

fields.Name: Roserade
fields.Pokedex: It attracts prey with a sweet aroma, then downs it with thorny whips hidden in its arms.

fields.Name: Cranidos
fields.Pokedex: It lived in jungles around 100 million years ago. Its skull is as hard as iron.

fields.Name: Rampardos
fields.Pokedex: Its powerful head butt has enough power to shatter even the most durable things upon impact.

fields.Name: Shieldon
fields.Pokedex: A Pokémon that lived in jungles around 100 million years ago. Its facial hide is extremely hard.

fields.Name: Bastiodon
fields.Pokedex: Any frontal attack is repulsed. It is a docile Pokémon that feeds on grass and berries.

fields.Name: Burmy
fields.Pokedex: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

fields.Name: Wormadam
fields.Pokedex: When Burmy evolved, its cloak became a part of this Pokémon's body. The cloak is never shed.

fields.Name: Mothim
fields.Pokedex: It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey collected by Combee.

fields.Name: Combee
fields.Pokedex: A Pokémon formed by three others. It busily carries sweet floral honey to Vespiquen.

fields.Name: Vespiquen
fields.Pokedex: Its abdomen is a honeycomb for grubs. It raises its grubs on honey collected by Combee.

fields.Name: Pachirisu
fields.Pokedex: It makes fur balls that crackle with static electricity. It stores them with berries in tree holes.

fields.Name: Buizel
fields.Pokedex: It has a flotation sac that is like an inflatable collar. It floats on water with its head out.

fields.Name: Floatzel
fields.Pokedex: It floats using its well-developed flotation sac. It assists in the rescues of drowning people.

fields.Name: Cherubi
fields.Pokedex: The small ball holds the nutrients needed for evolution. Apparently, it is very sweet and tasty.

fields.Name: Cherrim
fields.Pokedex: It blooms during times of strong sunlight. It tries to make up for everything it endured as a bud.

fields.Name: Shellos
fields.Pokedex: Its colors and shapes differ from region to region. In the Sinnoh region, two types are confirmed.

fields.Name: Gastrodon
fields.Pokedex: It has a pliable body without any bones. If any part of its body is torn off, it grows right back.

fields.Name: Ambipom
fields.Pokedex: To eat, it deftly shucks nuts with its two tails. It rarely uses its arms now.

fields.Name: Drifloon
fields.Pokedex: A Pokémon formed by the spirits of people and Pokémon. It loves damp, humid seasons.

fields.Name: Drifblim
fields.Pokedex: It's drowzy in daytime, but flies off in the evening in big groups. No one knows where they go.

fields.Name: Buneary
fields.Pokedex: It slams foes by sharply uncoiling its rolled ears. It stings enough to make a grown-up cry in pain.

fields.Name: Lopunny
fields.Pokedex: An extremely cautious Pokémon. It cloaks its body with its fluffy ear fur when it senses danger.

fields.Name: Mismagius
fields.Pokedex: Its cries sound like incantations. Those hearing it are tormented by headaches and hallucinations.

fields.Name: Honchkrow
fields.Pokedex: Becoming active at night, it is known to swarm with numerous Murkrow in tow.

fields.Name: Glameow
fields.Pokedex: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.

fields.Name: Purugly
fields.Pokedex: It is a brazen brute that barges its way into another Pokémon's nest and claims it as its own.

fields.Name: Chingling
fields.Pokedex: It emits cries by agitating an orb at the back of its throat. It moves with flouncing hops.

fields.Name: Stunky
fields.Pokedex: It protects itself by spraying a noxious fluid from its rear. The stench lingers for 24 hours.

fields.Name: Skuntank
fields.Pokedex: It sprays a vile-smelling fluid from the tip of its tail to attack. Its range is over 160 feet.

fields.Name: Bronzor
fields.Pokedex: Implements shaped like it were discovered in ancient tombs. It is unknown if they are related.

fields.Name: Bronzong
fields.Pokedex: One caused a news sensation when it was dug up at a construction site after a 2,000-year sleep.

fields.Name: Bonsly
fields.Pokedex: It looks as if it is always crying. It is actually adjusting its body's fluid levels by eliminating excess.

fields.Name: Mime Jr.
fields.Pokedex: It habitually mimics foes. Once mimicked, the foe cannot take its eyes off this Pokémon.

fields.Name: Happiny
fields.Pokedex: It loves round white things. It carries an egg-shaped rock in imitation of Chansey.

fields.Name: Chatot
fields.Pokedex: It can learn and speak human words. If they gather, they all learn the same saying.

fields.Name: Spiritomb
fields.Pokedex: A Pokémon that was formed by 108 spirits. It is bound to a fissure in an odd keystone.

fields.Name: Gible
fields.Pokedex: It nests in small, horizontal holes in cave walls. It pounces to catch prey that stray too close.

fields.Name: Gabite
fields.Pokedex: There is a long-held belief that medicine made from its scales will heal even incurable illnesses.

fields.Name: Garchomp
